name: Dock Derby
description:
This is a generic board-game you can play with any amount of people locally.
Navigate a dock and its many different paths, and get the most coins possible!

Controls
  • WASD - Move Player
  • Space - Main Action
Instructions
  • At the start, you will be prompted for player count and how many rounds.
  • To roll the dice during your turn, press space-bar.
  • Once you are finished with your turn, press space-bar again.
  • Once you move forwards, you cannot move to the previous tile.
  • Built in collisions will guide you, and punishments could include moving back.
  • Punishments and rewards include extra coins, skipping turns or extra moves
